metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43504 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description: Improper authentication vulnerability in WordPress versions prior to 6.0.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to obtain the email address of the user who posted a blog using the WordPress Post by Email Feature. The developer also provides new patched releases for all versions since 3.7.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
